duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify patient's alterations in health and assess their human response to health problems.
Implement nursing interventions based on theoretical concepts from nursing and other arts and sciences.
Evaluate the effectiveness of nursing interventions to achieve optimal patient outcomes.
Supervise/direct care provided by licensed practical nurses and unlicensed assistive personnel.
Assign/delegate care to other qualified members of the healthcare team.
Coordinate care between other professional disciplines as needed.
Provide and coordinate care to achieve excellent patient care and nursing's vision of setting a new standard of excellence in autonomous and accountable nursing practice.
Perform unit-based activities that contribute to a positive work and professional environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) and current RN license in the state of practice.
